effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move.  shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
effect_entries.short_effect: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather's type.

type depending on the weather.
